whoWeAre.title: Who Are We?
whoWeAre.content: The tournament is organized by **Ilia Vekua Physics-Mathematics Tbilisi Public School No. 42**. Our team has been working for years on popularizing natural sciences in Georgia and discovering talented youth.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.content: The International Young Naturalists' Tournament (IYNT) is not just a competition. It is a platform that helps students:
list: Learn teamwork and defend their ideas in scientific discussions.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do?
whatWeDo.content: We create an environment where physics, chemistry, and biology move from textbooks to real laboratories. Our goal is to popularize natural science subjects in Georgia. Through qualifying competitions, the **Georgian National Team** will be formed, which will worthily represent our country on the international arena.

whyIYNT.title: Why IYNT?
whyIYNT.content: This format differs from Olympiads. Here, the main focus is on the **process of discovery**. Participants take on the roles of reporter, opponent, and reviewer, preparing them for the real scientific world.
